Messages.Author: Eva Paton
Messages.Content: Dear students, a quick reminder: the final exam of this course will be written online. You can only find the access point to the exam on the ISIS platform of this course. The exam will open prompt at 10.00 on the 2.8.24 and will last for two hours. Best wishes, Eva Paton

Messages.Author: Eva Paton
Messages.Content: Dear students, due to organisational reasons, the Flussbad excursion, which was sheduled for the 15.7. has to be canceled. There will be no classes on that day. Regards, Eva Paton

Messages.Author: Eva Paton
Messages.Content: Dear students, unfortunately, I have to cancel the ecohydrology classes of tomorrow (Monday, 01.07) due to sickness. Best wishes, Eva Paton

Messages.Author: Eva Paton
Messages.Content: Hello, next Monday we will visit the Wasserwerk Friedrichshagen. Please arrive at 11.45 at Wasserwerk Friedrichshagen, Fürstenwalder Damm 602. The exursion itself starts at 12.00 o'clock and last about 2 hours. Please note that the local personnel of the Wasserwerk will give the tour and they only speak German. Best wishes, Eva Paton

Discussions.Discussion_Name: SWMM Software for tutorial next week

Messages.Author: Eva Paton
Messages.Content: Dear students, please do not forget to bring a computer to the next tutorial and please install the SWMM software beforehand (bad internet connection in the seminar room!). The software works only on pcs, not on macs. If you don't own a pc, please share a computer with other students during the tutorial. Here the download link for the software: https://www.epa.gov/water-research/storm-water-management-model-swmm#software%20and%20compatibility Or use the .exe file, which you can find in the course subsection. Best, Eva Paton

Messages.Author: Eva Paton
Messages.Content: Good morning, for your information: the online exam in the course Urban Ecohydrology will take place on the 2.8., 10-12, on the ISIS platform. Best wishes, Eva Paton

Messages.Author: Eva Paton
Messages.Content: Dear students, this is a copy of the email I had send earlier this week: please find below the list of students that were admitted to the course 'Urban Ecohydrology'. Please be aware that you will only get your place if you attend the session next Monday.  There are still 8 places available in this course, please turn up on Monday morning if you still want to join.  Best wishes, Eva Paton  List of students: Avital, Li Aziz Morgan, Mariam Chau Kevin Daldaban, Ender Drigalski, Lea Forti, Julia Nascimento Gholami, Mahdi Gholami, Mahdi Jöhren, Greta Kaiser, Leonie Klotz, Rosa Köhne, Linde Lode, Frida Nagel, Johanna Neunzig, Nina Pouchlá, Natálie Rohe, Erik Rönnecke, Lisa Roos, Maren Roth, Ramona Rummler, Thomas Schmidt, Loki Schumann, Anton Stephens, Jacqueline Tietzen von Harpe,Micaela Wiebe, Rosanna
